SimpleSelect.description: Basic SELECT query: SELECT id, name FROM users
SimpleSelect.current_performance: ~550-610 ns/op in CI with ModelType fast path
SimpleSelect.note: Test tokens include ModelType for fast int comparison path; increased tolerance for CI variability

ComplexQuery.description: Complex SELECT with JOIN, WHERE, ORDER BY, LIMIT
ComplexQuery.current_performance: ~2400-2600 ns/op in CI with ModelType fast path
ComplexQuery.note: Test tokens include ModelType for fast int comparison path; increased tolerance for CI variability

WindowFunction.description: Window function query: ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ... ORDER BY ...)
WindowFunction.current_performance: ~885-1005 ns/op in CI with ModelType fast path
WindowFunction.note: Test tokens include ModelType for fast int comparison path; increased tolerance for CI variability

CTE.description: Common Table Expression with WITH clause
CTE.current_performance: ~855-967 ns/op in CI with ModelType fast path
CTE.note: Test tokens include ModelType for fast int comparison path; increased tolerance for CI variability

INSERT.note: Test tokens include ModelType for fast int comparison path; baseline increased for CI environment variability

TokenizationThroughput.description: Tokenizer throughput in tokens per second

EndToEndSustained.description: End-to-end sustained throughput in operations per second
